ST_MainCharacters_Skills.Lune_FireRage_D.loc_ori: 每回合都对敌方全体造成大量炎火伤害，且伤害每回合逐渐提升，直到吕涅受到伤害为止。 如果被打断，那么自身陷入眩晕。 如果消耗，则伤害提升。
ST_MainCharacters_Skills.Lune_FireRage_D.loc_mod: 对敌方全体造成100%大量炎火伤害。 下一回合对敌方全体造成250%大量炎火伤害，之后的每回合伤害相较上回合提升y%，直到吕涅受到伤害为止。 如果被打断，那么自身陷入眩晕。 如果消耗，则伤害提升100%。 伤害提升的公式： y=50%*0.85^(x-3)，其中x为当前回合数， 计施放技能的回合为第1回合，第3回合开始有效。
ST_MainCharacters_Skills.Lune_FireRage_D.loc_new: 对敌方全体造成100%炎火伤害。 下一回合对敌方全体造成250%炎火伤害，之后的每回合伤害相较上回合提升y%，直到吕涅受到伤害为止。 如果被打断，那么自身陷入眩晕。 如果消耗，则伤害提升100%。 伤害提升的公式： y=50%*0.85^(x-3)，其中x为当前回合数， 计施放技能的回合为第1回合，第3回合开始有效。

ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BuffsDebuffs_De.enhanced:
Buff and Debuff base duration is 3 turns.

<keyword id="Buff_Regen_Left">Regen</>: Recover 10% Health on turn start.
<keyword id="Buff_Powerful_Left">Powerful</>: Deal 25% more damage.
<keyword id="Buff_Shell_Left">Shell</>: Take 20% less damage.
<keyword id="Buff_Rush_Left">Rush</>: Speed is increased by 33%.

<keyword id="Buff_Powerless_Left">Powerless</>: Deal 20% less damage.
<keyword id="Buff_Defenseless_Left">Defenceless</>: Take 25% more damage.
<keyword id="Buff_Slow_Left">Slow</>: Speed is decreased by 25%.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BuffsDebuffs_De.ori:
<keyword id="Buff_Regen_Left">Regen</> heals the Character by 10% max Health at the beginning of their turn.
<keyword id="Buff_Powerful_Left">Powerful</> amplifies the Character's damage by 25%.
<keyword id="Buff_Rush_Left">Rush</> increases the Speed of the Character by 33%.
<keyword id="Buff_Shell_Left">Shell</> reduces the damage received by the Character by 20%.

<keyword id="Buff_Powerless_Left">Powerless</> reduces the Character's damage dealt by 20%.
<keyword id="Buff_Slow_Left">Slow</> reduces the Speed of the Character by 25%.
<keyword id="Buff_Defenseless_Left">Defenceless</> increases the damage received by the Character by 25%.

ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.enhanced:
Maelle can use <Emphasis.Bold>Battle stances</> during combat. She recovers 1 AP when switching stances.

- In <keyword id="Stance_Defensive">Defensive stance</>: Take 50% less damage and recover 1 <keyword id="APShard">AP</> on Parry or Dodge.
- In <keyword id="Stance_Offensive">Offensive stance</>: Deal and take 50% more damage.
- In <keyword id="Stance_Virtuose">Virtuose stance</>: Deal 200% more damage and trigger <keyword id="Stance_Defensive"></> or <keyword id="Stance_Offensive"></> conditional effects of Skills.

<Emphasis.Bold>Base Attacks</> in <keyword id="Stance_Offensive">Offensive stance</> or in <keyword id="Stance_Defensive">Defensive stance</> switch her to the opposite stance.
If Maelle switches to a stance she is already in, she instead becomes <keyword id="Stance_Stanceless">Stanceless</>, which doesn't provide any bonus or penalty.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.ori:
Maelle's Skills change her <Emphasis.Bold>Battle Stance</>.

- <keyword id="Stance_Defensive">Defensive Stance</>: takes less damage and gains 1 <keyword id="APShard">AP</> per Parry or Dodge.
- <keyword id="Stance_Offensive">Offensive Stance</>: deals more damage but takes increased damage.
- <keyword id="Stance_Virtuose">Virtuose Stance</>: deals a lot more damage.

Switching to a new stance also provides Maelle with 1 <keyword id="APShard">AP</>

Switch between <Emphasis.Bold>Stances</> without interruption to maximise her Skills' effects.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.loc_ori: 玛埃尔可以通过技能改变自己的战斗姿态。 - 她采用防守站姿时，受到的伤害减少，而且每次格挡或闪避可以获得1个行动点。 - 她采用进攻站姿时，造成的伤害更高，但受到的伤害也更高。 - 她采用高手站姿时，造成的伤害大大提升。 玛埃尔切换这3种姿态时，还会获得1个行动点。 无缝轮换3种站姿，才能让玛埃尔充分发挥技能的效果。

- In <keyword id="Stance_Defensive">Defensive stance</>: Take 50% less damage and recover 1 <keyword id="APShard">AP</> on Parry or Dodge.
- In <keyword id="Stance_Offensive">Offensive stance</>: Deal and take 50% more damage.
- In <keyword id="Stance_Virtuose">Virtuose stance</>: Deal 200% more damage and trigger <keyword id="Stance_Defensive">Defensive</> or <keyword id="Stance_Offensive">Offensive</> conditional effects of Skills.

<Emphasis.Bold>Base Attacks</> in <keyword id="Stance_Offensive">Offensive stance</> or in <keyword id="Stance_Defensive">Defensive stance</> switch her to the opposite stance.
If Maelle switches to a stance she is already in, she instead becomes <keyword id="Stance_Stanceless">Stanceless</>, which doesn't provide any bonus or penalty.

Switch between <Emphasis.Bold>stances</> without interruption to maximise her Skills' effects.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.ori: Maelle's Skills change her Battle Stance. - In Defensive Stance, she takes less damage and gains 1 AP per Parry or Dodge. - In Offensive Stance, she deals more damage but takes increased damage. - In Virtuose Stance, she deals a lot more damage. - Entering any of these 3 Stances also provides Maelle with 1 AP Using the Base Attack in Offensive Stance or in Defensive Stance switches her to the opposite Stance. If Maelle switches to a Stance she is already in, she becomes Stanceless, which doesn't provide any bonus or penalty. Switch between Stances without interruption to maximise her Skills' effects.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.loc_ori: 玛埃尔可以通过技能改变自己的战斗姿态。 - 她采用防守站姿时，受到的伤害减少，而且每次格挡或闪避可以获得1个行动点。 - 她采用进攻站姿时，造成的伤害更高，但受到的伤害也更高。 - 她采用高手站姿时，造成的伤害大大提升。 - 玛埃尔采用这3种姿态时，还会获得1个行动点。 进攻站姿期间，发动基础攻击会切换防守站姿，防守站姿期间，发动基础攻击也会切换进攻站姿。 如果玛埃尔再次切换自己当前所用的站姿，就会进入无站姿状态，这个时候不享受加成，也不会受到惩罚。 适当轮换站姿，才能让玛埃尔充分发挥技能的效果。

ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BreakBar_Descri.enhanced:
All enemies have a <keyword id="Break">Break bar</> below their Health Bar.
When receiving damage from any source, the Break bar fills proportionally to damage received and the source's <text color="#808080">[</><text color="#D5B87C">Break multiplier</><text color="#808080">]</>.

When the Break bar is full, the enemy can then be <keyword id="StatusEffect_Stunned">Stunned</> by specific Skills, like <Emphasis.Bold>Overcharge</>. Stun usually lasts 1 turn.

A <keyword id="StatusEffect_Stunned">Stunned</> enemy takes 20% more damage.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BreakBar_Descri.ori:
All enemies have a <Emphasis.Bold>Break Bar</> situated below their Health Bar.
The <Emphasis.Bold>Break Bar</> fills when they receive damage from any source, proportional to the damage received.
Skills with multiple hits deal less damage to the <Emphasis.Bold>Break Bar</>.

When the <Emphasis.Bold>Break Bar</> is full, the enemy can then be <keyword id="Break">Broken</> by specific Skills, like <Emphasis.Bold>Overcharge</>.

A <keyword id="Break">Broken</> enemy takes 20% increased damage and is usually <keyword id="StatusEffect_Stunned">Stunned</> for 1 turn.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BreakBar_Descri.loc_ori:
所有敌方都有<Emphasis.Bold>击破槽</>，显示在生力条下方。
只要敌方受到伤害，<Emphasis.Bold>击破槽</>就会填充，幅度取决于伤害大小。
多段攻击技能对<Emphasis.Bold>击破槽</>的影响相对较小。

<Emphasis.Bold>击破槽</>填满时，<Emphasis.Bold>过荷</>等特定技能可以<keyword id="Break">击破</>敌方。

敌方处于<keyword id="Break">击破</>状态时，所受伤害提升20%，通常还会<keyword id="StatusEffect_Stunned">眩晕</>1回合。
ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BreakBar_Descri.loc_mod:
所有敌方都有<Emphasis.Bold>击破槽</>，显示在生命值条下方。
只要敌方受到伤害。<Emphasis.Bold>击破槽</>就会填充，幅度取决于伤害大小。
多段攻击技能对<Emphasis.Bold>击破槽</>的影响相对较小。

<Emphasis.Bold>击破槽</>填满时，<Emphasis.Bold>过荷</>等特定技能可以<keyword id="Break">击破</>敌方。

敌方处于<keyword id="Break">击破</>状态时，所受伤害提升20%，通常还会<keyword id="StatusEffect_Stunned">眩晕</>1回合。

ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_BattleWheel_Descr.enhanced:
During your turn, your Character can Attack, Aim, use a Skill, or use an Item.
Skills consume <keyword id="APShard">AP</> to use.

You can recover <keyword id="APShard">AP</> by performing a Base Attack or Parry.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_BattleWheel_Descr.ori:
During your turn, your Character can Attack, Aim, use a Skill, or use an Item.
Skills consume <keyword id="APShard">AP</> to use.

You can gain <keyword id="APShard">AP</> by performing a Base Attack or Parry.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_BattleWheel_Descr.loc_ori:
你的回合中，角色可以攻击、瞄准、使用技能或物品。
施展技能需要消耗<keyword id="APShard">行动点</>。

<keyword id="APShard">行动点</>可以靠基础攻击和格挡来积攒。
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_BattleWheel_Descr.loc_mod:
你的回合中，角色可以攻击、瞄准、使用技能或物品。
施展技能需要消耗<keyword id="APShard">行动点</>。

<keyword id="APShard">行动点</>可以靠基础攻击和格挡来积攒。
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_BattleWheel_Descr.loc_new:
你的回合中，角色可以攻击、瞄准、使用技能或物品。
施展技能需要消耗<keyword id="APShard">行动点</>。

<keyword id="APShard">行动点</>可以靠基础攻击和格挡来积攒。

ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_VersoUniqueMechan.enhanced:
Verso gains <Emphasis.Bold>Perfection</> when dealing damage, on Parry or on Dodge. Perfection rank is increased at the following threshold:
<Emphasis.Bold>C</>: 3, <Emphasis.Bold>B</>: 8, <Emphasis.Bold>A</>: 15, <Emphasis.Bold>S</>: 30

Verso deals 25% more damage at rank <Emphasis.Bold>C</>, doubled for each rank increase. (<Emphasis.Bold>D</>: 0%, <Emphasis.Bold>C</>: 25%, <Emphasis.Bold>B</>: 50%, <Emphasis.Bold>A</>: 100%, <Emphasis.Bold>S</>: 200%)
Taking any damage decreases Perfection rank (once per enemy turn).

Some Skills have additional effects at specific Perfection ranks.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_VersoUniqueMechan.ori:
Verso gains <Emphasis.Bold>Perfection</> every time he deals damage or manages to Parry or Dodge.

A higher Perfection Rank increases his damage. Some Skills have additional effects at specific Perfection Ranks.

Taking any damage removes 1 Perfection Rank (once per enemy turn).
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_VersoUniqueMechan.loc_ori:
维尔索造成伤害、成功格挡和闪避都能获得<Emphasis.Bold>至臻</>。

至臻层阶越高，造成的伤害就越高。维尔索达到特定至臻层阶时，部分技能会触发额外效果。

维尔索只要受到伤害，至臻层阶便会降低1阶（每个敌方回合最多触发一次）
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_VersoUniqueMechan.loc_mod:
维尔索造成伤害、成功格挡和闪避都能获得<Emphasis.Bold>至臻</>。

至臻层阶越高，造成的伤害就越高。维尔索达到特定至臻层阶时，部分技能会触发额外效果。

维尔索只要受到伤害。至臻层阶便会降低1阶（每个敌方回合最多触发一次）
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_VersoUniqueMechan.loc_new:
维尔索造成伤害、成功格挡和闪避都能获得<Emphasis.Bold>至臻</>。

至臻层阶越高，造成的伤害就越高。维尔索达到特定至臻层阶时，部分技能会触发额外效果。

维尔索只要受到伤害。至臻层阶便会降低1阶（每个敌方回合最多触发一次）

ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_ScielUniqueMechan.enhanced:
Sciel uses Skills that can consume or apply <Emphasis.Bold>Foretell</> (max 10) to enemies.

Skills that apply Foretell generate <keyword id="Foretell_Sun">Sun charges</>
Skills that consume Foretell generate <keyword id="Foretell_Moon">Moon charges</>
If Sciel has <keyword id="Foretell_Sun">Sun charges</>, she recovers +1 AP per Foretell consumed by <text color="#79B3D4">Moon Skills</>.
If she has <keyword id="Foretell_Moon">Moon charges</>, she recovers +1 AP per Foretell applied by <text color="#C0A06A">Sun Skills</>.

 If Sciel has both <keyword id="Foretell_Sun">Sun</> and <keyword id="Foretell_Moon">Moon charges</> at turn start, all charges are consumed to enter <keyword id="Foretell_Twilight">Twilight</> for 2 turns:
- Deal +25% more damage per charge consumed.
- Foretell application is doubled.
- Foretell max increased to 20.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_ScielUniqueMechan.ori:
Some of Sciel's Skills apply <Emphasis.Bold>Foretell</> to enemies (10 max. per enemy). These generate <keyword id="Foretell_Sun">Sun charges</>
Other Skills can consume the applied Foretell in order to amplify their effects. These generate <keyword id="Foretell_Moon">Moon charges</>

If Sciel has <keyword id="Foretell_Sun">Sun</> and <keyword id="Foretell_Moon">Moon charges</>, she consumes all charges to enter <keyword id="Foretell_Twilight">Twilight</>
<keyword id="Foretell_Twilight">Twilight</> lasts 2 turns and applies the following effects:
- increases damage dependent on the amount of charges consumed
- doubles Foretell applied with Skills
- increases the Foretell cap per enemy to 20
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_ScielUniqueMechan.loc_ori:
熙艾尔的部分技能可以对敌方施加<Emphasis.Bold>先见</>（每个敌方最多10层），这些技能会产生<keyword id="Foretell_Sun">旭日元能</>。
其余技能则可以消耗施加给敌人的先见以加强自身效果，这些技能会产生<keyword id="Foretell_Moon">朗月元能</>。

如果熙艾尔同时拥有<keyword id="Foretell_Sun">旭日元能</>和<keyword id="Foretell_Moon">朗月元能</>，她就会消耗所有元能，进入<keyword id="Foretell_Twilight">薄暮</>。
<keyword id="Foretell_Twilight">薄暮</>持续2回合，效果如下：
-伤害提升，幅度取决于所消耗元能的数量
-技能施加的先见层数翻倍
-最多可对每个敌方施加20层先见
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_ScielUniqueMechan.loc_mod:

-最多可对每个敌方施加20层先见
